name: Stickman Escape 3D
description:
The escape adventure has never been so fun. Save your red stickman from unexpected traps and tricky obstacles to get out of the prison.

Collect the weapons and defeat the guards and enemies on your way to the gate. Find the key to open the gate and escape. Your lover - Blue Stickman is waiting for you outside so don't make her wait for such a long time.

Why you’ll love our Red Stickman Escape 3D
- Plenty of tricky puzzles to solve
- Exciting stickman gameplay
- Various weapons to use
- Amazing ragdoll physics
- Beautiful graphics
- Easy-to-use controls

Figure out a way to outsmart everyone! Test your logic skills in one of the best 3D games. Lots of cool action missions and puzzles await you!

Let's break the prison NOW!!!
